bibl.title: Impactos da romanização em Alexandria: alguns debates bibliográficos. Avec résumés en portugais et en anglais: Impacts of Romanization to Alexandria: A Few Bibliographical Debates.
bibl.note: A brief bibliographic discussion on the importance of the changes brought to Alexandria by the Roman power and on the specificity of Egypt in Augustus' empire.
bibl.seg: Clímaco Joana Campos, Impactos da romanização em Alexandria: alguns debates bibliográficos. Avec résumés en portugais et en anglais: Impacts of Romanization to Alexandria: A Few Bibliographical Debates.
História Revista 14 (2009) pp. 261-290. [Accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < http://www.revistas.ufg.br/index.php/historia/index >.]
A brief bibliographic discussion on the importance of the changes brought to Alexandria by the Roman power and on the specificity of Egypt in Augustus' empire.
